column4: Is there any way that i can get root access without using sudo on terminal?
Or on mousepad?
not in Ubuntu.
i messed up the sudoer file, and now i dont have root privelages to fix it, andy ideas?
Boot a live CD.  Use root on that live CD to edit the file.
sudo, just like you do normally.  But the default user has no password
with the hoting company's CP
lol
Have you ever installed openVPN??
no :(
Looking at your output.  Install those packages?  (sudo apt-get install iptables_openvpn)  ?

I just read that and answered you before you could even ask the question.
